name: Shotgun Exorcism
description:
Shotgun Exorcism

Some time ago, the world's greatest minds came together to decide how to handle the growing paranormal threat.

The result: a shotgun.

You are a secret agent sent in to handle a deteriorating situation at a local graveyard. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to eradicate any trace of paranormal activity with extreme prejudice.

Controls

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move                           

Mouse - Aim | Left click to Fire                                      

R - Reload

Escape - Pause
